title: How to Duplicate Items in Oblivion

steps.title: Go to a store that sells scrolls.
steps.content: Go to a store that sells scrolls. The Imperial market district is a good place to look.

steps.title: Buy at least two or more of the same scroll.
steps.content: Buy at least two or more of the same scroll.

steps.title: When you have one of another item, click the two scrolls twice, then drop the item you want to duplicate.
steps.content: When you have one of another item, click the two scrolls twice, then drop the item you want to duplicate.

steps.title: When it drops there should be the number of items duplicated, depending on the number of identical scrolls in your possession when you clicked.
steps.content: When it drops there should be the number of items duplicated, depending on the number of identical scrolls in your possession when you clicked.

steps.title: Have fun with the duplicated items and your gold!
steps.content: Have fun with the duplicated items and your gold!
